# placeholderString

**Instance Property**

The placeholder text for the cell, specified as a plain text string.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var placeholderString: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assigning a new value to this property also clears out any value set for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFieldCell/placeholderAttributedString] property.

## Managing Placeholder Strings

- **placeholderAttributedString**: The placeholder text for the cell, specified as an attributed string.
